body.name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion with Vitamin E, Body Moisturizer for Extremely Dry Skin, Softens and Soothes, 7.25 Ounces, (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 1 min
features: Daily Skin Therapy: This fast absorbing unique solid balm provides deep hydration to heal and soften extremely dry skin while providing 48 hour moisture; Ideal for all skin types, normal to dry to eczema prone skin

Natural Factors: Cocoa Butter is a rich natural moisturizer that helps alleviate even the roughest, driest skin; Antioxidant Vitamin E helps improve the appearance of scars, stretch marks and imperfections

Finest Ingredients: We strive to use only the finest natural, raw ingredients to bring you soft, hydrated and beautiful hair and skin; We support sustainable production of Shea and Cocoa Butter and Coconut Oil worldwide

Choose What's Real: Our beauty products and hair and skin care treatments feature real, natural high-quality, plant-based ingredients in formulas that really work to hydrate and soften, from lip balm to bar soap to body butter

Why Palmers? For over 180 years, Palmer's has crafted treatment-oriented beauty products using Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil & Vitamin E to soothe, hydrate, soften, replenish and revitalize skin and hair
body.description: When it comes to dry skin solutions, cocoa butter is the answer. This multipurpose moisturizer does it all. When you're deciding between a lotion, cream, ointment, or balm to find the best solution for dry skin, cocoa butter harnesses its natural power to heal, protect, soothe, and soften rough, dry skin. Cocoa butter can easily absorb and provide deep and long-lasting moisture, and forms a barrier between your skin and the elements to seal in all-day moisture, keeping your skin hydrated no matter what it's like outside. Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Original Solid Lotion is crafted with intensively moisturizing Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E. If you’re looking for a lotion for dry skin, look no further than this unique multi-use concentrated solid balm. This versatile body balm has over 101 uses, and can also be used as a daily lip balm, makeup remover, primer for lipstick or eyeshadow, foot mask, hand mask, shaving cream, face moisturizer, in-shower moisturizer, hair conditioner, and more! Proudly made in U.S.A., Palmer's has been a trusted brand for over 180 years, providing high-quality natural products that are passed down from generation to generation.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #621 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #20 in Body Lotions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff! I originally purchased this to use on dry patches and my heels, and it really worked great. But now I'll slather this on every where! Yes it's a bit greasy or sticky when first applied, but I find that my skin drinks it in quickly...my skin has become drier as I've aged so this is very helpful. I also have eczema on my lower legs and this cream keeps it pretty well in check, and is soothing and stops the itch when I do have a flare-up. It moisturizes my skin and keeps it moisturized all day and through the night. I personally like the coconut fragrance, but it doesn't stick around for long so if I wear EDT it doesn't interfere with the scent. Can't go wrong with Palmers products! I've stopped using all other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is great. Wish I had this during my first pregnancy. I think it works so much better than coconut oil/butter (which someone told me is awesome) With this stuff I have gained no new stretch marks even with almost being due so my belly is very large. I put it on after showers or before bed as it takes a long time to absorb into the skin. It is also very greasy once applied. Very happy with this product. I still haven't gone through this one tub and it has been about 7 months. I have even skipped a few days of application and still feel good in the belly. I do recommend pairing this product with the lotion as it's easier to apply, absorbs quickly, way less greasy. Make it a double whammy for moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for before, (or after) bathing.
reviews.reviewText: Thick, solid, oily/waxy skin moisturizer. This is very good for extra skin moisturizing.Ingredients, as listed on the jar: Theobroma Cocoa (Cocoa) Extract, mineral oil (Paraffinum Liquium), Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Theobroma Cocoa (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Dimethicone, Fragrance (parfum), Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Beta Carotene (CI 40800), Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Benzoyl Benzoate, Benzoyl Cinnamate. As labeled.When you need more than lotion, or even creams can provide, this will surely oil up skin. My personal preference is to smear onto very dry skin, then shower off, occasionally. I wouldn't, personally, need to use daily, although some reviewers say they have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this to stretch out my surgery scars. My physical therapist uses this in her office and highly recommended. Great for stretch marks and skin hydration. The road maps of life don’t go away but the skin feels great. Every milestone in life should be cherished.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My therapist in rehab used this to massage a damaged foot. It’s creamy, smells great, and really softens the hard skin that forms on the bottom of my heels. Is a bit greasy when first applied but skin absorbs that quickly. Have never used such an effective lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for marks on skin and face
reviews.reviewText: Great for skin. Family has been using it for years. It leaves skin soft and great for marks and moisturizing face. Very costly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Bag Balm (lanolin) For extreme dryness.
reviews.reviewText: It smells wonderful.I hope my partner does not develop cannibalistic tendencies due to the sweet flavorful smell.It spreads like...butter.I tested it on the driest area on my body (heels).It works so well that I can feel my feet tingling.The same effect happens when using the oil from the same manufacturer.I find the butter a less messy solution with the same or less value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024

reviews.reviewText: I have used this product for years since I was in my 50's because it was casually recommended by a TV personality who said he also used it to keep his skin looking young. It is a simply moisturing product I use every morning after shaving and it makes my skin look alive and fresh. The sheen absorbs within an hour but the effect on the skin is that I look younger.

La crema de manteca de cacao, es una valiosa oportunidad de obtener una crema que realmente humecta y suaviza las partes más difíciles de mantener como son manos, codos, rodillas y pies, ha sido la mejor opción para cuidar mis pies que se resecan a causa de la diabetes. Definitivamente la recomiendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not your typical usage but I've been using it on a fresh tattoo to help it heal without scabbing, it's extremely soothing, smalls amazing and is keeping the tattoo moisturised very well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wonder butter for very dry itchy skin
reviews.reviewText: On my 6th tub, already ordered the 7. I have very dry skin and this helps me stay hydrated all day. I apply it at night and it keeps my skin moisturised for the next day as well. It works better than body shop, even bath and body works. Pair it with the palmers body oil(after shower) for the best ever results.P.S Got my whole family hooked onto this body butter.
Il profumo è gradevolissimo e rende la pelle sofficeConsigliato ✌
